text:
Running Win2k and ant 1.5.1
When using the copy task with a filterset (see sample below) on a unix formated 
file, the target file will be changed to PC formatted.

Sample:

<copy file="test.xml" todir="/etc" >
  <filterset begintoken="REPLACEWITH-" endtoken="-HERE" >
    <filter token="WAR_PATH" value="/www/apps/test.war" />
  </filterset>
</copy>

My guess is that it is never checked what filetype the file is, but only the 
localfile type is used when processing the file.
creator: daniel@hisbest.dk

text: This has been fixed in ant 1.6 and higher
creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
